abstract: Nepalese officials say Tara Air flight carrying 23 people lost contact minutes after takeoff, and is missing.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Nepal: Plane Carrying 23 Is Missing

snippet: A passenger plane carrying 23 people lost contact minutes after takeoff and is missing in mountainous territory, officials here said.
lead_paragraph: A passenger plane carrying 23 people lost contact minutes after takeoff and is missing in mountainous territory, officials here said.
